DOC.detailed_description: GLSE compound、Maitake mushroom extract compound Rinseng compound different mechanism enhance immunity.This clinicaltrial compare immune effect progress treat lung neoplasm breast carcinoma.Within 42 day , abide plan evaluate immunity enhancement monitoring mmune effector molecule .
DOC.criteria: lung cancer breast cancer patient confirm surgery pathology ; ECOG physical stamen score 0~3 point ; Expected lifetime > 3 month ; Need receive radiation chemotherapy ; Heart , liver kidney function blood picture normal , WBC≥4×109/L , neutrophil count≥ 2 x 109 / L , platelet count≥100×109/L , hemoglobin≥100 g/L ; To followup , good adherence Allergic text drug ; Pregnancy lactation woman ; Suffering mental illness easy control , Have serious mental cognitive dysfunction ; Can comply experimental scheme ca n't cooperate followup ; The patient unfavorable subject .
